login-subtitle: Please log in to your account to continue.
disclaimer: This system is intended for authorized medical staff only. Unauthorized access is prohibited. By logging in, you agree to the
termsLink: AptekaOne Terms of Use and Privacy Policy.
confirm-subtitle: Please enter the code from the Google Authenticator app
reset-password-subtitle: Enter your email address and we’ll send you a password reset link
reset-password-email-sent: We’ve sent a password reset link to {{email}}. Follow the instructions in the email to create a new password.
new-password-requirements: Password must be at least 8 characters long, include uppercase and lowercase letters, a number, and a special character

passwordValidation.minLength: Must be at least 8 characters long
passwordValidation.uppercaseLowercase: Include both uppercase and lowercase letters
passwordValidation.specialCharRequired: Include at least one special character (e.g., !?%$@#&)

password-updated-subtitle: Your password has been successfully changed. You can now log in with the new password.

profile.change-password-description: Keep your account secure by updating your password.
profile.2fa-description: Add an extra layer of protection. After enabling 2FA, you’ll need to enter a code from the Google Authenticator app each time you sign in.

update-profile.update-name-description: Please enter your first and last name as you’d like them to appear in the system.
update-profile.update-role-description: Select the appropriate role for user from the list.
update-profile.update-phone-description: Enter your current phone number. It will be used for internal contact if needed.
update-profile.update-password-description: Set a strong password to keep your account secure. Make sure it’s something only you know.
update-profile.2fa-description: Scan the QR code using the Google Authenticator app. Then, enter the 6-digit code generated by the app to complete setup.
